intro: This document serves as a comprehensive Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline specifically designed for the Copernicus Priority Area Monitoring product, Riparian Zones (RZ). It provides detailed descriptions of all LC/LU classes, encompassing their geographic characteristics, applicable input datasets, and relevant interpretation methods. This guide aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of riparian areas across the EEA-38 + UK region, supporting the Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services (MAES) initiative.
